"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54065c8a6368727ae4c10000#post_54065c8a6368727ae4c10000

If you're looking for something cheap, you could let your beard grow slightly more and dressed up as The Dude from the Big Lebowski.

Now, if you're looking for something just a little more fancy but not too expensive or elaborate, it would be a matter of just knowing what you're into in terms of fiction (movie genres, some character you really like, etc.)

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54065e176368720222e40000#post_54065e176368720222e40000

I didn't say it wasn't. But I can see where some of the backlash comes, is it blown out of proportion by some people? Absolutely.

The movie had everything to fail even with the trailers done so well, and it turned out to be one of the best movies of the year, despite the problems some people had.

So far, I've seen complains that we don't bond with Taylor as much as we bond with Cranston and many think it should've been backwards, or you know, work on the relationship between them and make it another subplot in the movie? That would've worked
